name: Masterpiece Manor
description:
Use your flashlight to flip tiles, flip them all to reveal the image and clear the stage!

Controls:

  • Left, Right / A, D / Numpad 4,6 - Move
  • Up / W / 8 - Jump
  • Down / S / 2 - Toggle Flashlight
  • Space / Shift / Z / Numpad 5 - Confirm in menus
  • Escape / Numpad 7 - Pause

Credits:

Programming (and game design) by sarn.
Art (and game design) by THX.
Sounds from the official Nokia 3310 jam resources page by Trix.

Made for NOKIA 3310 JAM 5.
